reviews.review: The game is really good it is fun to play but there are 2 problems on this game the russian guys that speak only russian and no english and u dont uderstand that much and the cheaters , well here is not a problem from the community  it is a problem from the anti cheat ! But this game is really  fun to play with your friends
buen juego eliminen a los hackers
Realy good and fun game! the only problem is the cheater.

The game is great but too many cheaters and Steam or the game itself(cs.go) it has a really poor protection against them and no matter what you do you have to either play against them till the end or you leave and get punished! you get kicked you get punished, you abandon the game you get punished, you go afk you get punished therefore there's nothing you can do but to play untill the end.
Cara... Melhor jogo de FPS que existe.
Ist meiner Meinung ein sehr gutes spiel leider Cheated zu viele aber das ist bei jedem Spiel wo man bisschen Skills braucht
zajebiste, polecam w chuj, jebac cheaterow i adamskiego.
